38#include <isc/time.h>
39#include <isc/util.h>

41#include <dns/db.h>
42#include <dns/dbiterator.h>
43#include <dns/diff.h>
44#include <dns/dnssec.h>
45#include <dns/ds.h>
46#include <dns/fixedname.h>
47#include <dns/keyvalues.h>
48#include <dns/log.h>
49#include <dns/master.h>
50#include <dns/masterdump.h>
51#include <dns/nsec.h>
52#include <dns/nsec3.h>
53#include <dns/rdata.h>
54#include <dns/rdatalist.h>
55#include <dns/rdataset.h>
56#include <dns/rdataclass.h>
57#include <dns/rdatasetiter.h>
58#include <dns/rdatastruct.h>
59#include <dns/rdatatype.h>
60#include <dns/result.h>
61#include <dns/soa.h>
62#include <dns/time.h>
63#include <dns/zoneverify.h>

65#include <dst/dst.h>

67#if USE_PKCS11
68#include <pk11/result.h>
69#endif
70
71#include "dnssectool.h"
72
73const char *program = "dnssec-verify";
74int verbose;
75
76static isc_stdtime_t now;
77static isc_mem_t *mctx = NULL;
78static dns_masterformat_t inputformat = dns_masterformat_text;
79static dns_db_t *gdb; /* The database */
80static dns_dbversion_t *gversion; /* The database version */
81static dns_rdataclass_t gclass; /* The class */
82static dns_name_t *gorigin; /* The database origin */
83static bool ignore_kskflag = false;
84static bool keyset_kskonly = false;
85
86/*%
87 * Load the zone file from disk
88 */
89static void
90loadzone(char *file, char *origin, dns_rdataclass_t rdclass, dns_db_t **db) {
91 isc_buffer_t b;
92 int len;
93 dns_fixedname_t fname;
94 dns_name_t *name;
95 isc_result_t result;
96
97 len = strlen(origin);
98 isc_buffer_init(&b, origin, len);
99 isc_buffer_add(&b, len);
100
101 name = dns_fixedname_initname(&fname);
102 result = dns_name_fromtext(name, &b, dns_rootname, 0, NULL);
103 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
104 fatal("failed converting name '%s' to dns format: %s",
105 origin, isc_result_totext(result));
106
107 result = dns_db_create(mctx, "rbt", name, dns_dbtype_zone,
108 rdclass, 0, NULL, db);
109 check_result(result, "dns_db_create()");
110
111 result = dns_db_load(*db, file, inputformat, 0);
112 switch (result) {
113 case DNS_R_SEENINCLUDE:
114 case ISC_R_SUCCESS:
115 break;
116 case DNS_R_NOTZONETOP:
117 /*
118 * Comparing pointers (vs. using strcmp()) is intentional: we
119 * want to check whether -o was supplied on the command line,
120 * not whether origin and file contain the same string.
121 */
122 if (origin == file) {
123 fatal("failed loading zone '%s' from file '%s': "
124 "use -o to specify a different zone origin",
125 origin, file);
126 }
127 /* FALLTHROUGH */
128 default:
129 fatal("failed loading zone from '%s': %s",
130 file, isc_result_totext(result));
131 }
132}
133
134ISC_PLATFORM_NORETURN_PRE static void
135usage(void) ISC_PLATFORM_NORETURN_POST;
136
137static void
138usage(void) {
139 fprintf(stderr, "Usage:\n");
140 fprintf(stderr, "\t%s [options] zonefile [keys]\n", program);
141
142 fprintf(stderr, "\n");
143
144 fprintf(stderr, "Version: %s\n", VERSION);
145
146 fprintf(stderr, "Options: (default value in parenthesis) \n");
147 fprintf(stderr, "\t-v debuglevel (0)\n");
148 fprintf(stderr, "\t-V:\tprint version information\n");
149 fprintf(stderr, "\t-o origin:\n");
150 fprintf(stderr, "\t\tzone origin (name of zonefile)\n");
151 fprintf(stderr, "\t-I format:\n");
152 fprintf(stderr, "\t\tfile format of input zonefile (text)\n");
153 fprintf(stderr, "\t-c class (IN)\n");
154 fprintf(stderr, "\t-E engine:\n");
155#if USE_PKCS11
156 fprintf(stderr, "\t\tpath to PKCS#11 provider library "
157 "(default is %s)\n", PK11_LIB_LOCATION);
158#else
159 fprintf(stderr, "\t\tname of an OpenSSL engine to use\n");
160#endif
161 fprintf(stderr, "\t-x:\tDNSKEY record signed with KSKs only, "
162 "not ZSKs\n");
163 fprintf(stderr, "\t-z:\tAll records signed with KSKs\n");
164 exit(0);
165}
166
167int
168main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
169 char *origin = NULL, *file = NULL;
170 char *inputformatstr = NULL;
171 isc_result_t result;
172 isc_log_t *log = NULL;
173 const char *engine = NULL;
174 char *classname = NULL;
175 dns_rdataclass_t rdclass;
176 char *endp;
177 int ch;
178
179#define CMDLINE_FLAGS \
180 "hm:o:I:c:E:v:Vxz"
181
182 /*
183 * Process memory debugging argument first.
184 */
185 while ((ch = isc_commandline_parse(argc, argv, CMDLINE_FLAGS)) != -1) {
186 switch (ch) {
187 case 'm':
188 if (strcasecmp(isc_commandline_argument, "record") == 0)
189 isc_mem_debugging |= ISC_MEM_DEBUGRECORD;
190 if (strcasecmp(isc_commandline_argument, "trace") == 0)
191 isc_mem_debugging |= ISC_MEM_DEBUGTRACE;
192 if (strcasecmp(isc_commandline_argument, "usage") == 0)
193 isc_mem_debugging |= ISC_MEM_DEBUGUSAGE;
194 if (strcasecmp(isc_commandline_argument, "size") == 0)
195 isc_mem_debugging |= ISC_MEM_DEBUGSIZE;
196 if (strcasecmp(isc_commandline_argument, "mctx") == 0)
197 isc_mem_debugging |= ISC_MEM_DEBUGCTX;
198 break;
199 default:
200 break;
201 }
202 }
203 isc_commandline_reset = true;
204 check_result(isc_app_start(), "isc_app_start");
205
206 result = isc_mem_create(0, 0, &mctx);
207 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
208 fatal("out of memory");
209
210#if USE_PKCS11
211 pk11_result_register();
212#endif
213 dns_result_register();
214
215 isc_commandline_errprint = false;
216
217 while ((ch = isc_commandline_parse(argc, argv, CMDLINE_FLAGS)) != -1) {
218 switch (ch) {
219 case 'c':
220 classname = isc_commandline_argument;
221 break;
222
223 case 'E':
224 engine = isc_commandline_argument;
225 break;
226
227 case 'I':
228 inputformatstr = isc_commandline_argument;
229 break;
230
231 case 'm':
232 break;
233
234 case 'o':
235 origin = isc_commandline_argument;
236 break;
237
238 case 'v':
239 endp = NULL;
240 verbose = strtol(isc_commandline_argument, &endp, 0);
241 if (*endp != '\0')
242 fatal("verbose level must be numeric");
243 break;
244
245 case 'x':
246 keyset_kskonly = true;
247 break;
248
249 case 'z':
250 ignore_kskflag = true;
251 break;
252
253 case '?':
254 if (isc_commandline_option != '?')
255 fprintf(stderr, "%s: invalid argument -%c\n",
256 program, isc_commandline_option);
257 /* FALLTHROUGH */
258
259 case 'h':
260 /* Does not return. */
261 usage();
262
263 case 'V':
264 /* Does not return. */
265 version(program);
266
267 default:
268 fprintf(stderr, "%s: unhandled option -%c\n",
269 program, isc_commandline_option);
270 exit(1);
271 }
272 }
273
274 result = dst_lib_init(mctx, engine);
275 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
276 fatal("could not initialize dst: %s",
277 isc_result_totext(result));
278
279 isc_stdtime_get(&now);
280
281 rdclass = strtoclass(classname);
282
283 setup_logging(mctx, &log);
284
285 argc -= isc_commandline_index;
286 argv += isc_commandline_index;
287
288 if (argc < 1)
289 usage();
290
291 file = argv[0];
292
293 argc -= 1;
294 argv += 1;
295
296 POST(argc);
297 POST(argv);
298
299 if (origin == NULL)
300 origin = file;
301
302 if (inputformatstr != NULL) {
303 if (strcasecmp(inputformatstr, "text") == 0)
304 inputformat = dns_masterformat_text;
305 else if (strcasecmp(inputformatstr, "raw") == 0)
306 inputformat = dns_masterformat_raw;
307 else
308 fatal("unknown file format: %s\n", inputformatstr);
309 }
310
311 gdb = NULL;
312 fprintf(stderr, "Loading zone '%s' from file '%s'\n", origin, file);
313 loadzone(file, origin, rdclass, &gdb);
314 gorigin = dns_db_origin(gdb);
315 gclass = dns_db_class(gdb);
316
317 gversion = NULL;
318 result = dns_db_newversion(gdb, &gversion);
319 check_result(result, "dns_db_newversion()");
320
321 result = dns_zoneverify_dnssec(NULL, gdb, gversion, gorigin, NULL,
322 mctx, ignore_kskflag, keyset_kskonly);
323
324 dns_db_closeversion(gdb, &gversion, false);
325 dns_db_detach(&gdb);
326
327 cleanup_logging(&log);
328 dst_lib_destroy();
329 dns_name_destroy();
330 if (verbose > 10)
331 isc_mem_stats(mctx, stdout);
332 isc_mem_destroy(&mctx);
333
334 (void) isc_app_finish();
335
336 return (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS ? 0 : 1);
337}
